summary: The numbers in Calendar popup in Settings>vacation responder and in tasks mole are displayed as ASCII digits instead of Arabic-Indic digits.

comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Login to gmail 2. Set UI to Persian 3. Go to general settings and open the date picker in vacation responder drop down list. (or) Open a task mole, open a task and click on date picker. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Expected Results: Number should be displayed as Arabic-Indic digits. Actual Results: The numbers are displayed as ASCII digit. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Repro on all OS/Browsers. Please provide any additional information below.
